briefTitle: A Clinical Trial To Assess Fesoterodine On Treatment Satisfaction And Symptom Improvement In Overactive Bladder Patients
officialTitle: A 12-Week, Multicenter, Open-Label, Single-Arm Study To Evaluate The Effects Of Fesoterodine On Treatment Satisfaction And Symptom Relief In Overactive Bladder Patients.
summary: To evaluate the effect of fesoterodine on patient satisfaction and overactive bladder (OAB) symptom relief in OAB patients who were dissatisfied with their prior therapy with tolterodine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Number of Micturition Episodes Per 24 Hours
